item.title: tweet thread on that
item.description:
Ant Breach on Twitter

“Our new @CentreforCities report proves Britain’s housing crisis is much worse than you probably think. We’re missing 4.3 million homes. To close the backlog in 25 years, England’s 300k housing target needs to be increased to 442k, and in 10 years, to 654k. https://t.co/G507qAHETN”

URL: https://twitter.com/AntBreach/status/1628295517028470785
